name: Home in Florence B&B

reviews.title: Everything was delightful...
reviews.text: Massimiliano, the proprietor, and his staff were helpful, friendly, and hardworking. The room, with painted ceiling, lovely antique furniture, mini-fridge, and a huge bathroom, was incredibly clean. We had plenty of hot water, a rarity in Italy. The free internet access was a welcome touch. The location was great as it was only 15 minutes from the main attractions. The street was mostly quiet, save for the rare motorino in the middle of the night. The breakfast, which is served at a bar down the street and around the corner, was fantastic. The barista, Giancarlo, is welcoming, and we enjoyed being part of the fabric of Florentine daily life, watching people stop in for a cappucino before making their way to work or to drop their kids at school.

If you're planning a visit to Florence and think that staying in the historic center is the only way to go, think again!!! This great little B&B enjoys a super-convenient Oltrarno location in the Santo Spirito district (Via Santa Maria, 21).
reviews.title: Great stay in Santo Spirito!!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The advantage of this location lies in its proximity to the various bridges that cross the Arno, allowing walkers to reach anywhere from the main train station (Firenze Santa Maria Novella) to the Uffizi Gallery and most points of interest 'in mezzo' in ten minutes or less.
reviews.title: Awesome Place, Friendly Staff!

reviews.title: My home in Florencia!
reviews.text: We stayed in the Santa Maria property on April 2007 for three nights on an excellent spacious and clean room. Clean private bathroom which included a washing machine that we did not use it but was available. Including in the price was the use of internet that was very useful to stay in contact with family and friends as well to arrange other accomodations during our trip.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Paul the manager was very helpful and friendly. As welcome to our "home in Florence" Paul had a bottle of wine for us in our room. By the way an excellent wine. The site was well located in relation to the sites to visit in the city of Florence. We walked all the time back and forth to the city. It was very safe even late at night. Located in a old 16th century old building. The ttrain terminal was about 15 minutes walk. I wll be back in our next visit to Florence we recomend it strongly

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed at the Home in Florence Bed and Breakfast in room 5, Giotto, for 5 nights in June.
reviews.title: Comfortable and a good value

reviews.text: The room was comfortable with a large bed, consisting of two twins made up together. There was room on either side of the bed for a night table. In the room there was a small desk, a wardrobe, a mini fridge and a private bathroom. The bathroom contained a toilet/bidet, a sink and a small shower. The construction was new and everything was clean. There was a window with shutters and drapes that opened onto the street. It was quiet because the B&B is on a side street and there is not much traffic.
reviews.title: The other side of the Arno
Wonderful first visit to Florence!
reviews.text: The other feature that was very much appreciated was the air conditioning! It was about 90F for much of our stay and the room being air-conditioned was essential. The free internet access was also a very good feature. We were able to connect our laptop to the Net via a wired connection in the room. There is also a small safe in the room for passport, money and valuables.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hosts were very helpful and friendly. They gave us help finding restaurants and with the bus routes.The hosts are not always at the B&B so you must make sure to arrive during their open hours, or to make arrangements in advance to have them meet you there. They are more than willing to do this. They also provided us with a phone number where they could be reached if they were not at the desk.
reviews.title: a relaxing base in florence

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Our only difficulties while we were in Florence were due to the shortage of taxis. It was impossible to get a taxi because there was a big fashion show going on at the same time and there were not enough cabs. The hosts tried to get a taxi for us, but could not get one either.
reviews.title: We loved this place

likes.disliked: — Reception wasn't open for very long
